name: Castle of Songs
description: Castle of Songs is a game where the objective is to build a castle built by songs.  Each level contains a song, and you must  score a certain amount of points before the song ends to win that song.  In this prototype, there are 3 levels, each with an increasing amount of points to score and each with different songs.  Win all 3 levels to complete the castle.  Difficulty = Beginner.
